text: int tree [ 100 ] ; int num_rows ; int solve ( int row , int pos ) { if ( row > num_rows ) return 0 ; int t1 = solve ( row + 1 , pos ) ; int t2 = solve ( row + 1 , pos + 1 ) ; int node = ( ( ( row - 1 ) * ( row ) ) >> 1 ) + pos ; if ( t2 > t1 ) return tree [ node ] + t2 ; return tree [ node ] + t1 ; } int main ( ) { int i , testcases ; scanf ( "%d" , & testcases ) ; while ( testcases -- ) { i = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & num_rows ) ; while ( i < ( ( num_rows * ( num_rows + 1 ) ) >> 1 ) ) { scanf ( "%d" , & tree [ i ++ ] ) ; } printf ( "%d" , solve ( 1 , 0 ) ) ; } return 0 ; }
